verses.verse: Now it came to pass in the <S%H7970>thirtieth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%>, in the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H2568>month<s%>, in the fifth day of the <S%H2320>month<s%>, as I was <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1473>captives<s%> by the <S%H5104>river<s%> of <S%H3529>Chebar<s%>, that the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> were <S%H6605>opened<s%>, and I <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H4759>visions<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>.
In the <S%H2568>fifth<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month<s%>, which was the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H3112>Jehoiachin<s%>'s <S%H1546>captivity<s%>,

The <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> came expressly unto <S%H3168>Ezekiel<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H941>Buzi<s%>, in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%> by the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H3529>Chebar<s%>; and the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the Lord was there upon <S%H3068>him<s%>.

And I <S%H7200>looked<s%>, <S%H7307>and<s%>, behold, a whirlwind <S%H935>came<s%> out of the <S%H6828>north<s%>, a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H6051>cloud<s%>, and a <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H3947>infolding<s%> <S%H5051>itself<s%>, and a brightness was <S%H5439>about<s%> <S%H8432>it<s%>, and out of the midst there as the <S%H5869>color<s%> of <S%H2830>amber<s%>, out of the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H784>fire<s%>.

Also out of the <S%H8432>midst<s%> there came the <S%H1823>likeness<s%> of <S%H702>four<s%> living <S%H2416>creatures<s%>. And this was their <S%H4758>appearance<s%>; <S%H2007>they<s%> had the <S%H1823>likeness<s%> of a <S%H120>man<s%>.
And every <S%H259>one<s%> had <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H6440>faces<s%>, and every <S%H259>one<s%> had <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3671>wings<s%>.

And their <S%H7272>feet<s%> were <S%H3477>straight<s%> <S%H7272>feet<s%>; and the <S%H3709>sole<s%> of their <S%H7272>feet<s%> was like the <S%H3709>sole<s%> of a <S%H5695>calf<s%>'s <S%H7272>foot<s%>: and they <S%H5340>sparkled<s%> like the <S%H5869>color<s%> of <S%H7044>burnished<s%> <S%H5178>brass<s%>.

And they had the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of a <S%H120>man<s%> under their <S%H3671>wings<s%> on their <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7253>sides<s%>; and they <S%H702>four<s%> had their <S%H6440>faces<s%> and their <S%H3671>wings<s%>.

Their <S%H3671>wings<s%> were <S%H2266>joined<s%> <S%H802>one<s%> to <S%H269>another<s%>; they <S%H5437>turned<s%> not when they <S%H3212>went<s%>; they <S%H3212>went<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H5676>straight<s%> <S%H6440>forward<s%>.

As for the <S%H1823>likeness<s%> of their <S%H6440>faces<s%>, they <S%H702>four<s%> had the <S%H6440>face<s%> of a <S%H120>man<s%>, and the <S%H6440>face<s%> of a <S%H738>lion<s%>, on the right <S%H3225>side<s%>: and they <S%H702>four<s%> had the <S%H6440>face<s%> of a <S%H7794>ox<s%> on the left <S%H8040>side<s%>; they <S%H702>four<s%> also had the <S%H6440>face<s%> of a <S%H5404>eagle<s%>.

Thus were their <S%H6440>faces<s%>: and their <S%H3671>wings<s%> were <S%H6504>stretched<s%> <S%H4605>upward<s%>; <S%H8147>two<s%> wings of every <S%H376>one<s%> were <S%H2266>joined<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> to <S%H376>another<s%>, and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3680>covered<s%> their <S%H1472>bodies<s%>.

And they <S%H3212>went<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H5676>straight<s%> <S%H6440>forward<s%>: where the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> was to <S%H3212>go<s%>, they <S%H3212>went<s%>; and they <S%H5437>turned<s%> not when they <S%H3212>went<s%>.

As for the <S%H1823>likeness<s%> of the living <S%H2416>creatures<s%>, their <S%H4758>appearance<s%> was like <S%H1197>burning<s%> <S%H1513>coals<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%>, and like the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of <S%H3940>lamps<s%>: it went up and <S%H1980>down<s%> among the living <S%H2416>creatures<s%>; and the <S%H784>fire<s%> was <S%H5051>bright<s%>, and out of the <S%H784>fire<s%> went <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H1300>lightning<s%>.
And the living <S%H2416>creatures<s%> <S%H7519>ran<s%> and <S%H7725>returned<s%> as the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of a flash of <S%H965>lightning<s%>.

Now as I <S%H7200>looked<s%> the living <S%H2416>creatures<s%>, behold <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H212>wheel<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H681>by<s%> the living <S%H2416>creatures<s%>, with his <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H6440>faces<s%>.

The <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of the <S%H212>wheels<s%> and their <S%H4639>work<s%> was like unto the <S%H5869>color<s%> of a <S%H8658>beryl<s%>: and they <S%H702>four<s%> had <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1823>likeness<s%>: and their <S%H4758>appearance<s%> and their <S%H4639>work<s%> was as it were a <S%H212>wheel<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of a <S%H212>wheel<s%>.
When they <S%H3212>went<s%>, they <S%H3212>went<s%> upon their <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7253>sides<s%>: and they <S%H5437>turned<s%> not when they <S%H3212>went<s%>.

As for their <S%H1354>rings<s%>, they were so <S%H1363>high<s%> that they were <S%H3374>dreadful<s%>; and their <S%H1354>rings<s%> were <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H5869>eyes<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> them <S%H702>four<s%>.

And when the living <S%H2416>creatures<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%>, the <S%H212>wheels<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> by <S%H681>them<s%>: and when the living <S%H2416>creatures<s%> were lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> from the <S%H776>earth<s%>, the <S%H212>wheels<s%> were lifted <S%H5375>up<s%>.

Wherever the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> was to <S%H3212>go<s%>, they <S%H3212>went<s%>, there was their <S%H7307>spirit<s%> to <S%H3212>go<s%>; and the <S%H212>wheels<s%> were lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> over <S%H5980>against<s%> <S%H7307>them<s%>: for the spirit of the living <S%H2416>creature<s%> was in the <S%H212>wheels<s%>.

When those <S%H3212>went<s%>, these <S%H3212>went<s%>; and when those <S%H5975>stood<s%>, these <S%H5975>stood<s%>; and when those were lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> from the <S%H776>earth<s%>, the <S%H212>wheels<s%> were lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> over <S%H5980>against<s%> <S%H7307>them<s%>: for the spirit of the living <S%H2416>creature<s%> was in the <S%H212>wheels<s%>.

And the <S%H1823>likeness<s%> of the <S%H7549>firmament<s%> upon the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the living <S%H2416>creature<s%> was as the <S%H5869>color<s%> of the <S%H3372>terrible<s%> <S%H7140>crystal<s%>, stretched <S%H5186>forth<s%> over their <S%H7218>heads<s%> <S%H4605>above<s%>.

And under the <S%H7549>firmament<s%> were their <S%H3671>wings<s%> <S%H3477>straight<s%>, the <S%H802>one<s%> toward the <S%H269>other<s%>: every <S%H376>one<s%> had <S%H8147>two<s%>, which <S%H3680>covered<s%> on this <S%H2007>side<s%>, and every <S%H376>one<s%> had <S%H8147>two<s%>, which <S%H3680>covered<s%> on that <S%H2007>side<s%>, their <S%H1472>bodies<s%>.

And when they <S%H3212>went<s%>, I <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of their <S%H3671>wings<s%>, like the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%>, as the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%>, the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H1999>speech<s%>, as the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of a <S%H4264>army<s%>: when they <S%H5975>stood<s%>, they let <S%H7503>down<s%> their <S%H3671>wings<s%>.
And there was a <S%H6963>voice<s%> from the <S%H7549>firmament<s%> that was over their <S%H7218>heads<s%>, when they <S%H5975>stood<s%>, and had let <S%H7503>down<s%> their <S%H3671>wings<s%>.

And <S%H4605>above<s%> the <S%H7549>firmament<s%> that was over their <S%H7218>heads<s%> was the <S%H1823>likeness<s%> of a <S%H3678>throne<s%>, as the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of a <S%H5601>sapphire<s%> <S%H68>stone<s%>: and upon the <S%H1823>likeness<s%> of the <S%H3678>throne<s%> was the <S%H1823>likeness<s%> as the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of a <S%H120>man<s%> above upon <S%H4605>it<s%>.

And I <S%H7200>saw<s%> as the <S%H5869>color<s%> of <S%H2830>amber<s%>, as the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> <S%H1004>inside<s%> <S%H4758>it<s%>, from the appearance of his <S%H4975>body<s%> even <S%H4605>upward<s%>, and from the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of his <S%H4975>body<s%> even <S%H4295>downward<s%>, I <S%H7200>saw<s%> as it were the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%>, and it had <S%H5051>brightness<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>.

As the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of the <S%H7198>bow<s%> that is in the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H1653>rain<s%>, so was the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of the <S%H5051>brightness<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>. This was the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of the <S%H1823>likeness<s%> of the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>. And when I <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H5307>it<s%>, I fell upon my <S%H6440>face<s%>, and I <S%H8085>heard<s%> a <S%H6963>voice<s%> of one that <S%H1696>spoke<s%>.
